body_html: @joseortiz3 @Tvde1 , I noticed that you use the v140 toolset with vs 2017 maybe by setting BAZEL_VC="C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC"? I use the v141 toolset with CUDA 10 by setting BAZEL_VS="C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community"(I use community edition).
